summary: The aim of this mod is to change the way vanilla followers look in game whilst trying to keep some of the vanilla heritage. This mod ALSO offers 100% freedom of choice!
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][size=3]Please Read Everything Before Download!!![/size][/i][/b][u][b][i][color=rgb(255,0,0)][size=3]
[/size][/color][/i][/b][/u]
[b][i][u][color=rgb(255,0,0)][size=3]Description[/size][/color][/u][/i][/b]
The aim of this mod is to change the way vanilla followers look in game, whilst trying to maintain some of the vanilla heritage.
This mod also changes the Height Scaling. So now all the Females will no longer be the same height. I think its more realistic :)

[i][b]Each follower is it's own download! Meaning that YOU the player are free to mix & match as much as you want with other files within this mod OR with other mods... After all, Everybody's taste is different! :D[/b][/i]

[i]Please leave constructive criticism, thoughts and ideas on how you think this mod can improve!
I ignore rude/hurtful comments, and welcome positive feedback![/i]

[b][i][u][color=#ff0000][size=3]Followers so far[/size][/color][/u][/i][/b]
[color=#ff7700][i][b]Option 1 (Opt.1): [/b][/i][/color]Requires ApachiiSkyHairFemale 1.5[i]
[/i][color=#cccccc]Grey[/color]= Done [color=#ffff00]Yellow[/color]= In the works
[color=#b6b6b6]Aela
Annekke
Lydia
Uthgerd
Iona
Jenassa
Rayya
Jordis
Brelyna
Mjoll
Njada
Ria[/color]

[color=#ff7700][i][b]Option 2 (Opt.2): [/b][/i][color=rgb(255,255,255)]Requires ApachiiSkyHair 1.6_Full [/color][i][color=rgb(255,255,255)](main file) And ApachiiSkyHairFemale 1.5[/color][/i][/color]
[color=rgb(255,255,0)][color=#ffff00]In the works[/color][/color]

[b][i][u][color=#ff0000][size=3]Installation
[/size][/color][/u][/i][/b]Use the "Download with Manager" option.
[color=#ff7700][b][i]Manual Install:[/i][/b][/color] Download and [b]DO NOT Extract[/b]! Simply use the Mod Management tool of your choosing, select add mod from file, and add the .7z file you just downloaded.
You should be able to do that with Mod Organizer! But I don't know, as I do not use it.
[i][b][color=#ff7700]Alternately:[/color][/b][/i] You can also follow this folder path (NOT RECOMMENDED)
[color=#d5a6bd][i]Place the .esp file in your Data folder [/i](steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data)[i]
Texture files here [/i](steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/textures/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/skyrim.esm)
[i]Meshes file here [/i](steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/facegendata/facegeom/skyrim.esm)
[/color][b][i][color=#ffd966]If you do this, you should keep a note of what files were added and where![/color][/i][/b]
[color=#ff7700][size=2][i][b]Uninstall:[/b] [/i][/size][/color][size=2]Use the Mod Management tool that you use. or If you followed the folder path, remove the Textures (.dds and .tga) and Meshes (.NIF) files and remove the .esp file.[/size][color=rgb(255,0,0)][size=3][b][i][u]
[/u][/i][/b][/size][/color][b][i][u][color=#ff0000][size=3]
Note
[/size][/color][/u][/i][/b][size=2]I am thinking of using some of the hairs from ApachiiSkyHairs main file in Option 2. So for any Opt.2 file ApachiiSkyHair_Full will be needed along with the Female Hair file. [/size][b][i][size=2]BOTH WILL BE NEEDED!![/size][/i][/b]

[i]Let me know witch followers you want a second option for first![/i]

[b][i]Please don't hesitate to send in your own photos :)[/i][/b]

[b][i][u][color=rgb(255,0,0)][size=3]Requirements
[/size][/color][/u][/i][/b][size=2]ApachiiSkyHair: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?[/size][/url]
[color=#ff7700][i][b]Please Download the Female Hair Pack[/b][/i][/color][i][b][color=#ff7700]![/color][/b][/i] [b][i]Or this mod will not work!

[/i][u][color=rgb(255,0,0)][size=3][i]Recommended
[/i][/size][/color][/u][/b][color=#ff7700][i]Any Body Type of your choosing:
[/i][/color][i][b]CBBE:[/b][/i] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?[/url]
[i][b]WSCO:[/b][/i] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52322/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52322/?[/url]
These are just the ones that I use :)
[i][b]Natural Eyes:[/b][/i] [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?[/url] [b]Highly Recommended! [/b]Especially for the purpose of the Dark Elves.
[b][u][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][/u][/b][b][u][color=#ff0000][size=3][i]Special Thanks
[/i][/size][/color][/u][/b][color=#00ffff][size=2][b][i]Apachii[/i][/b][/size][/color][size=2] For the hairs used
[b][i][color=#00ffff]Caliente[/color][/i][/b] and [b][i][color=#00ffff]Windsong[/color][/i][/b] For the Amazing body mods
[b][i][color=#00ffff]Bethesda[/color][/i][/b] For the wonderful game of Skyrim[/size][b][i][u][s]
[/s][/u][/i][/b]And [b][i][color=#00ffff]All you lovely folks[/color][/i][/b] that downloaded my mod ;)
author: jaybird19
